mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD (BNO, TITEL, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, WRITER = #{writer} WHERE BNO = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT BNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER, REGDATE, VIEWCNT FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE BNO > 0 ORDER BY BNO DESC
